title: Caillebotte Paintings and Drawings at the Art Institute of Chicago
copy:
Caillebotte Paintings and Drawings at the Art Institute of Chicago

We are delighted to present the third volume in the series of scholarly catalogues for the Impressionist and Post-Impressionist paintings and unique works on paper in the collection of the Art Institute of Chicago.
